tool_description: Defines and organizes specific cleaning tasks with duration estimates, required supplies, and difficulty levels.

task_category.description: Type of task (daily, weekly, monthly, seasonal, deep_clean)

applicable_rooms.description: Room types where this task applies

seasonal_variation.description: Whether task frequency changes by season

error_messages: Invalid task_category: Must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly, seasonal, deep_clean]
Invalid difficulty_level: Must be one of [easy, moderate, hard]
Invalid estimated_duration: Must be a positive integer
Empty required_supplies: At least one supply must be specified
Empty applicable_rooms: At least one room type must be specified
usage: Define all cleaning tasks that will be used in schedules. Include realistic time estimates and complete supply lists.
